{{title|1=operator=={{small|(ranges::join_view::''iterator'', ranges::join_view::''iterator'')}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/join_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
friend constexpr bool operator==( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires
        /*ref-is-glvalue*/ &amp;&amp;
        std::equality_comparable&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt; &amp;&amp;
        std::equality_comparable&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;ranges::range_reference_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Compares the underlying iterators.

Equivalent to: {{c|1=return (x.outer_ == y.outer_) and (x.inner_ == y.inner_);}}, where {{rlpi|/#Data members|outer_}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|inner_}} are the underlying iterators. The constant {{c|/*ref-is-glvalue*/}} in the requires-clause is equal to {{c|std::is_reference_v&lt;ranges::range_reference_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt;}}.

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|std::ranges::join_view::''iterator''&lt;Const&gt;}}|plural=no}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x, y|iterators to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Result of comparison.
